spell_list.description: The group's attacks will have a chance to restore a very small amount of power to the group and inflict damage upon the target enemy. All damage and power restoration is attributed to the coercer. Applies 10 triggers when cast and the triggers are shared amongst the group. Higher ranks lower the base reuse time.
spell_list.description_pvp: The group's attacks will have a chance to restore a very small amount of power to the group and inflict damage upon the target enemy. All damage and power restoration is attributed to the coercer. Applies 10 triggers when cast and the triggers are shared amongst the group. Higher ranks lower the base reuse time.

effect_list.description: On any combat or spell hit this spell may cast Ether Balance on target of attack, which can be triggered up to 10 times across all targets.  Triggers about 2.0 times per minute.
Increases power of group members (AE) by 2

spell_list.name: Ether Balance
